headline: Software Engineer II at LexisNexis | AWS Certified (Solutions Architect, Cloud Practitioner) | Hashicorp Certified (Terraform Associate (003)) | MS CS at NC State\'23 | Medium Tech blogger
summary:
I work in Cloud, mainly Kubernetes! I am here to connect with skilled professionals in any tech related domain.

I have grabbed some cool certifications from AWS: AWS Solutions Architect & AWS Cloud Practitioner and Hashicorp Terraform Associate too!
Sometimes I post about my projects on my Github and solve some Leetcode problems as well.Don't forget to read my Medium articles:https://medium.com/@jainshubham0403

experiences.title: Software Engineer II
experiences.description:
Provisioned Karpenter through Helm charts and ArgoCD for intelligent node scheduling and managing the workloads on the cluster according to their requirements thus saving almost 8% monthly costs.
• Implemented cost savings strategies like Graviton node migration and ECR cleanups at LNLP that brought down the EKS monthly
costs by 13% along with the multi-architecture docker image builds.
• Reduced the startup time by heavy AI/ML k8s pods drastically from minutes to a few seconds by implementing a bootstrap image
caching solution using Daemonset and Karpenter.
• Worked on setting up Network & Kyverno policies for setting guardrails for different namespaces in a multi-tenant cluster
environment.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
- Migrated more than 10 core component applications from the legacy Infrastructure to the standardized Infrastructure for Kubernetes cluster using Argo CD that is being used by various customers across the organization.
- Created multiple Kyverno policies to manage the security of the cluster and made it organizable via Splunk Dashboard which is currently managing approximately 12 policies across 7 clusters and is expected to grow in size with more customers.
- Implemented NVIDIA GPU Operator to that will provision GPU nodes to manage the AI workloads on the clusters.
- Provisioned Karpenter for automatically scheduling and managing the workloads on the cluster according to their requirements thus saving almost 8% monthly costs and the effort to manually create cluster auto scalars

accomplishment_projects.title: Software Engineering Java Project: Blog Rest API app
accomplishment_projects.description: \u2022Developed the fully working REST-API Blog app using Java Spring Boot Framework with multiple endpoints and SQL database.\n\u2022Successfully developed the CRUD operations and integrated Spring Database Security, Pagination & Sorting features as well.\n\u2022Containerized the whole application using Docker and deployed it on a Kubernetes cluster with full configuration set up using Config Map, Secret Keys and Services.

accomplishment_projects.title: Software Engineering DBMS Project: AUTOR-SQL
accomplishment_projects.description: \u2022Developed an Automobile Servicing app using Java Backend and integrated it with SQL database using Oracle JDBC.\n\u2022Used various DDL, DML queries to create, populate and update the database.\n\u2022The business app logic was written in Java and used various joins to form relations between the different sets of schemas.

accomplishment_projects.title: DevOps Project: Pipeline (init, build, test, deploy)
accomplishment_projects.description:
- Worked on developing Pipeline Architecture: Init, Build, Test, Deploy
- Used Oracle VirtualBox to develop on Virtual Machines and set up dependencies for running Java application.
- Implemented Fuzzing testing techniques and applied mutation testing over 1000 iterations to test Java application
- Deployed the Java application on Digital Ocean cloud provider and setting up of Proxy server for blue-green deployment was also done successfully.
- Setting up of similar pipeline for Angular application was done along with code analysis codacy, cloc, PMD, EsLint

accomplishment_projects.title: Discord Reward Bot
accomplishment_projects.description: - Programmed backend code in JavaScript for handling all the use-cases of the bot such as rewarding points to users.\n- Handled the database of the bot using PostGresql database and integrated it with the use-cases as well.\n- Created the message-embeds for front-end and linked the bot to GitHub using webhooks to monitor GitHub activities

accomplishment_projects.title: Of Course I Love Mars Filter for Instagram
accomplishment_projects.description:
The filter contains following features built in consideration for optimising the same on Instagram Reels:

Panoramic 360-Degree World Experience: This filter basically immerses the user into completely new surroundings of Mars planet thus giving its users an amazing out of the world experience. As the user moves, the background in the filter moves accordingly or in other words, it gives user a panoramic 360-degree world experience.

Astronaut Helmet: The filter augments the user’s reality by adding an astronaut helmet on the user’s face which moves and responds according to user’s head movement.

Animated Drones: If the user taps on the drones present in the scene, the drones change their location thereby creating a user-friendly experience.

Dust Particles: The filter contains dust particles throughout the screen to give users World AR immersive exposure.

Background Audio: This filter has a background audio associated with it which can be heard whenever user operates the filter.

User Voice Modulation: It has an interesting feature where the filter basically modulates the user’s voice if he/she speaks whist recording the video using the filter.

Read more about it in article: https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6704853521805705216/

accomplishment_projects.title: Jal Android App
accomplishment_projects.description:
An Extraordinary Android App for all concerns related to Water Supply issues and Complants. User needs to enter KNO and password and can have their following problems sorted:
1. Wrong Water Bill
2. Water Supply issues
3. Pay Water Bill
4. Error in Water Meter
5. Pipeline Leakage, etc.
Users can also check their complaint status and moreover, department guys can also use it to resolve people's complaints.
